_aChangeLog.text: Added soundscapes
Added colour correction
Adjusted fog colour
Changed some lighting
Added new store interior
Added path to secret sewer area
Coffee shop windows are now breakable
Changed/added/removed props throughout the map
Added underground garage/loading bay
Moved kryptonite to a more obvious location
Added security booth next to coded gate for easier entry
Added ladder from sewer to underground complex
Moved balcony teleporters
Made most doors toggle instead of slam shut
Added another underground teleporter to the streets
Added small side room to lab
Kryptonite zombie now gets 10000 health
Lab doors now open/close faster
Sewer manhole is now easier to enter
Fixed spot on roof where it was possible to get stuck as Superman

_aLatestUpdates._sText: This is the full release of zm_london

_sText:
zm\_london by Soft Serve (a.k.a. Satin Storm)

Features:

- Above ground: city streets, market, pub, night club, and several small interiors.
- Below ground: laboratory, sewers, train depot, and many tunnels leading to various places.
- Three special items: kryptonite (T), gas mask (CT), and Superman (CT)!
- Many hiding spots suitable for both limited and unlimited ammo servers.
- Several secret teleporters, buttons, coded rooms, and other hidden areas.

---

Special item info:

- Gas mask (Human, Deagle): Allows user to survive the airlock cycle in the ventilation shafts. Passive.
- Superman (Human, P90): Enables user to fly and run quickly. Passive.
- Kryptonite (Zombie, Knife): Slows down and removes Superman's ability to fly for 30 seconds. Infinite uses. 60 second cooldown.

---

Version history:

v1_0 (FULL RELEASE)

- Added soundscapes
- Added colour correction
- Adjusted fog colour
- Changed some lighting
- Added new store interior
- Added path to secret sewer area
- Coffee shop windows are now breakable
- Changed/added/removed props throughout the map
- Added underground garage/loading bay
- Moved kryptonite to a more obvious location
- Added security booth next to coded gate for easier entry
- Added ladder from sewer to underground complex
- Moved balcony teleporters
- Made most doors toggle instead of slam shut
- Added another underground teleporter to the streets
- Added small side room to lab
- Kryptonite zombie now gets 10000 health
- Lab doors now open/close faster
- Sewer manhole is now easier to enter
- Fixed spot on roof where it was possible to get stuck as Superman

v0_3 (not released on GB)

- Buffed kryptonite
- Various small fixes and balance tweaks

v0_2

- First public release.

v0_1

- Private beta.
